H0.text: Which passenger liner was torpedoed and sunk on 7th May 1915. Titanic

H1.text: Which passenger liner was torpedoed and sunk on 7th May 1915. Britannic

H2.text: Which passenger liner was torpedoed and sunk on 7th May 1915. Aquitania

H3.text: Which passenger liner was torpedoed and sunk on 7th May 1915. LUSITANIA

A4.text: The German submarine U-20 hit her with a torpedo on 7 May 1915 at 14:10, 11 miles (18 km) off the Old Head of Kinsale, Ireland, leading to her sinking about 18 minutes later.

A5.text: The sinking killed more than a hundred US citizens and significantly increased American public support for entering the war, which occurred in 1917 with the United States declaration of war on Germany.
